titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John H. Platt title search 1985.052
titlestmt.author: Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-07-31 20:17:46 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.abstract: Photocopies of a title search for a parcel of land located at Carlton Avenue and Warren Street (which was later renamed Prospect Place) in Brooklyn. The title search covers the period 1779 to 1882.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John H. Platt title search, 1779-1882, 1985.052, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photocopies of a title search for a parcel of land located at Carlton Avenue and Warren Street (which was later renamed Prospect Place) in Brooklyn. The title search covers the period 1779 to 1882.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This item is in the public domain.

controlaccess.subject: Real property -- New York (State) -- New York
